name: Notes Of Citrus
description:
You've been sent to deliver a parcel to 452 Winchester Drive. An old mansion in the country

Simple job, 

Knock on the door, 

Deliver the parcel, 

Collect your shillings and leave

*********************************************************************************

Small game made in 1 week

(By the way, the name comes from a scene in Hannibal where hes eating 'human' meat and comments that it has "notes of citrus" meaning the animal was panicking when it was killed
